article.title: Booz Allen Hamilton Awarded Nearly $24 Million for Biometrics Technologies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton, Incorporated, Herndon, Virginia, was awarded a nearly $24 million contract for biometrics, identity management, and homeland security technologies research and analysis for Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Atlantic. 55th Contracting Squadran, Offutt Air Force Base, Nebraska, is the contracting activity.
